title: Venezuela 's budget balance in relation to GDP 2018
yAxis: Budget balance in relation to GDP
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Budget balance in relation to GDP, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall Budget balance in relation to GDP has increased over the Year.

Budget balance in relation to GDP is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, roughly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, and finally gradually increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Budget balance in relation to GDP, about 30.56 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Budget balance in relation to GDP about 3.46 was reached at Year 2008

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Budget balance in relation to GDP, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall Budget balance in relation to GDP has increased over the Year.

Budget balance in relation to GDP is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, roughly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, and finally gradually increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Budget balance in relation to GDP, about 30.56 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Budget balance in relation to GDP about 3.46 was reached at Year 2008
The line rapidly increased by 151.16% from Year 2008 to 2009,increased by 73.84% from Year 2010 to 2011, and lastly, increased by 83.99% from Year 2017 to 2018.
